parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Valid values: 1 to 99. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: RestoreType
parameters.description:
The type of the data source. Valid values:

*   **ECS_FILE**: Elastic Compute Service (ECS) files
*   **OSS**: Object Storage Service (OSS) buckets
*   **NAS**: Apsara File Storage NAS file systems
*   **OTS_TABLE**: Tablestore instances
*   **UDM_ECS_ROLLBACK**: ECS instances
